name: Galactic Tax Officer
text: Supreme overlord, we can quietly increase taxation on your subjects this cycle.

options.text: Yes. Squeeze them a little.
options.reaction: Your wish is my command, my lord. The ledgers will bleed with new revenue.

options.text: No. Let them breathe.
options.reaction: As you decree. The scribes will stand down and the people will whisper your mercy.

name: Angry Citizen
text: The tax rates are far too high, overlord! We can barely survive.

options.text: Fine. Ease the burden slightly.
options.reaction: Th-thank you, my lord. Maybe we can see our children eat again.

options.text: No. The empire needs every coin.
options.reaction: Wha-no... please! You will squeeze us until we break.

name: Shady Merchant
text: Overlord, I can sell you rare artifacts from distant worlds.

options.text: Buy the artifacts.
options.reaction: A pleasure doing business, overlord. These trinkets will dazzle your court.

options.text: Refuse. This smells like a scam.
options.reaction: Tch. You wound me, my lord. May your vault never know true wonder.

name: Void Wizard
text: Overlord... care to take a gamble with the currents of fate?

options.text: Yes. I welcome fortune or ruin.
options.reaction: Excellent. The void stirs. Let us see whom it favors today.

options.text: No. I do not trust cosmic dice.
options.reaction: Caution is a cage and a shield, overlord. The void will wait for another day.

name: Bounty Huntress
text: Overlord, a criminal wreaks havoc on your subjects. Pay me and I will hunt them down.

options.text: Hire her to hunt the criminal.
options.reaction: Your quarry is mine, my lord. I will bring you news one way or another.

options.text: Let the criminal roam. It is beneath my concern.
options.reaction: Then your people will bleed in the streets, not on my blade. Remember that choice.

name: Veiled Prophet
text: For a small offering, I will peer into the mood of your subjects.

options.text: Pay her to read the currents.
options.reaction: The veil parts for those who pay the price. Listen carefully to what I reveal next.

options.text: I do not need omens.
options.reaction: Then walk blind among storms, overlord. The fates will not soften your fall.

name: Imperial Tax Collector
text: Overlord, your citizens have paid their taxes. These funds are now yours.

options.text: Excellent. Add it to the treasury.
options.reaction: At once, my lord. The coffers will gleam with the sweat of your subjects.

name: Refugee Fleet
text: Overlord, a fleet of displaced aliens seeks shelter in your territory.

options.text: Grant them sanctuary.
options.reaction: We are in your debt, great one. Your name will be a blessing in our stories.

options.text: Turn them away at the border.
options.reaction: Please... no. Our children. The fleet turns away, and hatred follows in its wake.

name: Regent Viri of Zorath
text: Overlord, Zorath stands ready. With investment, we can harden our industry or pacify the streets.

options.text: Invest in Zorath's forges.
options.reaction: Zorath will roar brighter than ever. The workers will curse the hours but love the pay.

options.text: Zorath will manage without special treatment.
options.reaction: As you say, overlord. Zorath will endure, but it will remember who paid the price.

name: Drogan of Karnax Prime
text: Overlord, Karnax Prime watches your rise. We could pledge our forges and fleets to your banner.

options.text: Welcome Karnax into the empire.
options.reaction: Then Karnax Prime bends the knee. Our docks and cannons now roar for you.

options.text: Refuse. Karnax is not worth the trouble.
options.reaction: So be it. Karnax will remember this slight when the stars change hands.

name: Lyra of Elysion Spires
text: Overlord, the spires of Elysion offer culture, science, and a very large tax base.

options.text: Fold Elysion into the empire.
options.reaction: Then the spires will shine in your colors. Our scholars already debate how to praise you.

options.text: Decline. Their decadence annoys me.
options.reaction: Decadent or not, overlord, our influence is vast. You may find our doors closed next time.

name: Forge-Lord Kor of Vorath
text: Overlord, Vorath Forge offers raw power. We build weapons that rewrite battlefields.

options.text: Bring Vorath into the war machine.
options.reaction: Then our anvils sing for you. Every hammer blow will echo your name.

options.text: I do not need Vorath.
options.reaction: You will when the next war comes, overlord. Remember who you turned away.

name: Shade-Queen Nyx of Nyxia Veil
text: Overlord, Nyxia Veil has spies in every court. Let us serve, and secrets will flow to you.

options.text: Accept Nyxia's allegiance.
options.reaction: The Veil closes around your enemies. They will never see you coming again.

options.text: I do not deal in shadows.
options.reaction: Then you will be surprised often, overlord. Secrets resent being ignored.

name: Chancellor Talen of Talora Rings
text: Overlord, the trade lanes of Talora Rings could enrich your coffers many times over.

options.text: Bring Talora into the fold.
options.reaction: Then every ship that circles our rings will toast your rule.

options.text: Turn them away. I will take what I need elsewhere.
options.reaction: Trade finds new routes, overlord. Just pray those routes do not lead to your enemies.
